course.title: MAT 3155 Introd to Differential Geomet. (3 units)
course.desc: Introduction to elementary Riemannian geometry, applications to curves and surfaces, special topics chosen from geometry and physics.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: (MAT 2120, MAT 2121) or (MAT 2122, MAT 2125) or (MAT 2120, MAT 2322), (MAT 2141 or MAT 2342).
